review: I love it! I just sold my AppleTV to a friend. This is by far, better than AppleTV, or Roku. The gaming is pretty good, with graphics similar to my old Xbox 360. Of course, your choices are limited to the App Store. The voice search feature is nice and very accurate. WiFi connectivity is flawless, and a welcomed feature. The remote is fantastic! It sounds weird to praise a remote, but this one feels solid and responsive. The only thing that I was disappointed with was the lack of any Google services such as Play Movies. I get why Amazon promotes its own content ecosystem, but this being Android powered I thought my Google content would just be a download away. Other than that minor detail, I am very pleased and surprised by Amazon's FireTV. It's truly best in class.
